channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 拉脱维亚财政部长表示，波罗的海国家将开始放宽部分金融监管，因为六年前一家大型银行的倒闭引发了一波限制浪潮
item.description:
Latvia’s finance chief says the Baltic nation will begin easing some of its financial regulations after the collapse of a major bank six years ago triggered a wave of restrictions https://t.co/KyOC0m1Nm8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 据消息人士称，英美烟草公司准备最快于本周启动出售其在印度合作伙伴 ITC 公司的部分股份的计划
item.description:
British American Tobacco is preparing to kick off a sale of part of its stake in Indian partner ITC as soon as this week, sources say https://t.co/SQ6Ncj9qk2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 卢拉总统将要求巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）首席执行官解释其对红利危机的处理方式，该危机上周导致国有石油公司市值损失 110 亿美元。
item.description:
President Lula will demand that Petrobras chief executive officer explains his handling of a dividends crisis that wiped out $11 billion of the state-owned oil company’s market value last week https://t.co/adj3ths0xz

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 比特币令人眼花缭乱的涨势获得了更多牵引力，而股市的连胜势头可能还有很长的路要走
item.description:
Bitcoin’s dizzying rally gained more traction, and the winning streak for stocks may yet have a ways to go https://t.co/MukfoBwX2F

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 纽约联邦储备银行的一项调查显示，2 月份美国消费者对未来三年通胀的预期有所上升
item.description:
US consumer expectations for inflation over the next three years climbed in February, a Federal Reserve Bank of New York survey showed https://t.co/xZ2hyxms9O

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 阿达尼集团将开始绘制亚洲最大的贫民窟地图，这是孟买中心地带一个极具价值的区域，这家从港口到电力的企业集团将对其进行重建
item.description:
Adani Group is set to begin mapping Asia’s largest slum, a highly valuable area at the heart of Mumbai that the port-to-power conglomerate will redevelop https://t.co/edJ5pTdmR2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 欧盟国家就计划中的 "打工经济 "工人权利规则达成突破性进展
item.description:
European Union countries reached a breakthrough on planned rules over workers’ rights in the gig economy https://t.co/KOCPSuWA8i

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 新斯科舍银行的资产管理部门减持了其在以色列国防承包商埃尔比特系统公司（Elbit Systems）中的股份，去年以色列与哈马斯之间的战争持续不断，这项投资引发了抗议。
item.description:
Bank of Nova Scotia’s asset-management arm reduced its stake in Israeli defense contractor Elbit Systems, an investment that sparked protests last year as the war between Israel and Hamas raged on. https://t.co/8XcVMwCDSX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: Moderna 的首席财务官加入 Odd Lots 播客，讨论大型制药公司的资金分配方式
item.description:
Moderna's CFO joins to Odd Lots podcast to discuss how capital is really allocated in big pharma https://t.co/v0rXHCRwb2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 美国之行凸显制裁困境，德国莱弗森银行股价暴跌
item.description:
Raiffeisen Tumbles as US Visit Highlights Sanctions Tightrope https://t.co/mODV8Nu3LG

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 对于政治家来说，前所未有的寻求庇护者潮是一个棘手的问题，没有简单的答案。而对于泰森食品公司（Tyson Foods）等企业来说，这则是一个机遇。
item.description:
For politicians, an unprecedented stream of asylum seekers presents an intractable problem with no easy answers. For companies like Tyson Foods, this presents an opportunity. https://t.co/Nsv0Ykvbt9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 乔治-索罗斯（George Soros）旗下价值 250 亿美元的 "开放社会基金会"（Open Society Foundations）主席即将卸任，这是自这位亿万富翁的儿子亚历克斯（Alex）接管该慈善机构以来的最新变动。
item.description:
The president of George Soros’ $25 billion Open Society Foundations is stepping down in the latest change since the billionaire’s son Alex took over the charity. https://t.co/c17cMbEDGl

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 美国政府希望扣押俄罗斯的主权资产，以帮助乌克兰作战并支持其破碎的经济。一些盟国对这一举动及其可能开创的先例持谨慎态度
item.description:
The US government wants to seize Russian sovereign assets to help Ukraine fight and support its shattered economy. Some allies are wary of such a move and the precedent it might set https://t.co/R1dMd6aISm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 投资者被扣留的资金数额惊人，引起了华尔街的关注，这是 1 万亿美元商业抵押贷款支持证券市场的一个潜在新风险。
item.description:
A shocking amount of money held back from investors has drawn attention on Wall Street as a potential new risk in the $1 trillion market for commercial mortgage-backed securities. https://t.co/dGLTJP9xLK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 黑石集团（Blackstone）、阿波罗集团（Apollo）和贝恩资本（Bain Capital）豪赌数十亿美元，认为 Netflix 等服务将满足好莱坞对音效舞台的无底需求。他们即将发现自己是否错了。
item.description:
Blackstone, Apollo and Bain Capital bet billions of dollars that services like Netflix would feed bottomless demand for Hollywood sound stages. They’re about to find out if they’re wrong. https://t.co/Zmijyjqdz4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 欧元兑美元平价开始重新成为华尔街的话题
item.description:
Euro-dollar parity is starting to creep back into Wall Street’s conversation https://t.co/KXsXxqIJu3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 耗资 160 亿英镑的 Xlinks 项目计划将摩洛哥的绿色电力输送到德国，而不是英国。
item.description:
The £16 billion Xlinks project plans an option to send green power from Morocco to Germany, instead of the UK https://t.co/90474PIXjf

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 埃及将重新成为新兴市场的宠儿、沙特阿美公司的丰厚红利以及拜登对以色列的警告。阅读中东时事通讯
item.description:
Egypt is set for a return as an emerging-market favorite, Saudi Aramco's bumper dividends and Biden's warning to Israel. Read the Middle East newsletter https://t.co/XK9UuJRSO0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: HitecVision 正在与顾问合作研究 NEO Energy 的战略备选方案，其中可能包括与另一家运营商合并。
item.description:
HitecVision is working with advisers as it studies strategic alternatives for NEO Energy, which could include merging it with another operator https://t.co/fGk8x4VNt3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 作为对冲基金股票交易业务更广泛重组的一部分，Balyasny 资产管理公司聘请了几位投资组合经理。
item.description:
Balyasny Asset Management has hired several portfolio managers as part of a broader restructuring of the hedge fund’s equity trading businesses. https://t.co/3ke20Mq80i

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，阿布扎比正在成立一家技术投资公司，目标是人工智能和半导体领域的交易，几年内管理的资产规模可能超过 1,000 亿美元
item.description:
Abu Dhabi is setting up a technology investment firm targeting deals in artificial intelligence and semiconductors that could surpass $100 billion in assets under management in a few years, sources say https://t.co/DaEAjHoV5B

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 葡萄牙总统将在下周会见议会中的政党代表，这是任命新总理进程的一部分
item.description:
Portugal's president will meet parties represented in parliament over the next week, as part of the process of naming a new prime minister https://t.co/CN5cQ8cHTT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 美国股市在短时间内走过了漫长的道路，这让一些人开始谈论泡沫。毫无疑问，它在历史上是昂贵的。但在实际操作中，私人投资者该如何做才能不损害自己的投资组合呢？
item.description:
The US stock market has come a long way in a short time, inspiring some to talk of bubbles. There's no doubt that it's historically expensive. But in practical terms, what can a private investor do about it without damaging their portfolio? https://t.co/s9N2cOmN6d

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯正在权衡下周大选后大幅增税的方案，以便为弗拉基米尔-普京入侵乌克兰提供资金
item.description:
Russia is weighing options for big tax increases after next week's election, in order to fund Vladimir Putin's invasion of Ukraine https://t.co/HwrHFusiqN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 巴基斯坦任命哈比卜银行首席执行官为新任财政部长，以帮助巴基斯坦在一场争议性选举后扶持资金短缺的经济。
item.description:
Pakistan has appointed Habib Bank’s chief executive officer as its new finance minister to help bolster the cash-strapped economy after a contentious election https://t.co/vjdFsHoKk1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 将购买比特币作为企业战略一部分的企业软件公司微策略（MicroStrategy）以 8.217 亿美元的价格又收购了 12,000 枚加密代币。
item.description:
MicroStrategy, the enterprise software firm that has made buying Bitcoin part of its corporate strategy, acquired 12,000 more of the cryptocurrency tokens for $821.7 million. https://t.co/gmSXN2qae2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.description:
Raymond James Financial Inc. is the latest firm to snap up executives from Citigroup’s shuttering municipal-bond division. https://t.co/axm0FSLfec

item.title: 农业强国巴西正在收获一个又一个丰收。然而，种植者却以惊人的速度破产。
item.description:
Agricultural powerhouse Brazil is harvesting one bumper crop after another. Yet, growers are going bankrupt at an alarming rate. https://t.co/foQYdFFsgx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 随着帮助解决去年地区银行危机的紧急贷款工具到期，华尔街银行正在寻找其他方法来充实自己的资金。
item.description:
Wall Street banks are hunting for alternative ways to shore up their coffers as an emergency lending tool that helped resolve last year’s regional banking crisis expires. https://t.co/wG0CXB8QWh

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024
